course.title: MAT 5341 Quantum Computing (3 units)
course.desc: Space of quantum bits; entanglement. Observables in quantum mechanics. Density matrix and Schmidt decomposition. Quantum cryptography. Classical and quantum logic gates. Quantum Fourier transform. Shor's quantum algorithm for factorization of integers. This course is equivalent to MATH 5821 at Carleton University.Course Component: Lecture
